runners.sql: insert overwrite table model.model_trade_merge_df partition(dt='${dt}') select a.*,b.*,c.*,d.* from (select * from dwd.dwd_mo_order_info_df a where dt='${dt}') a left join (select * from dwd.dwd_mo_order_extend_df b where b.dt = '${dt}') b on a.id = b.order_id  left join (select * from dwd.dwd_mo_order_detail_df c where c.dt = '${dt}') c on a.id = c.order_id left join (select * from dwd.dwd_mo_order_promotion_df d where d.dt = '${dt}') d on a.id = d.order_id
